captions.text:
So I thought this was going to happen
guys I got nominated three times yesterday
to do the ALS ice bucket challenge right...

Thank you Adrian Grenier, thank you
Kevin from Instagram
and thank you Cooking For Amber for all nominating me
So as I got three votes, sorry, three votes... I thought I better step it up a little bit.
So before I get completely soaken
I nominate, Prince Harry, our very own
Russell Brand and the Epic Meal Time's Harley

to do your ALS ice bucket
challenge
So you've got 24 hours to do that guys and let's do the ice bucket challenge
(Slow Motion Screams)
ohh that's terrible! That is awful. Oh my god I'm so cold
It's just gone everywhere that it shouldn't go as well
and I've gotta make dinner
I've got some lovely air loom tomatoes, basil and if you wana see how I make this into a beautiful pasta dish
Then I'll put it up tomorrow... Oh my god.
Thank you Kevin from Instagram, Adrian... Oh nooo
(Slow Motion Screams)
and to please my kids, I'm going to nominate three massive Youtubers. Girls tell them who you're going to nominate
Zoe Sugg, Joe Sugg and Alfie Deyes
You've got 24 hours to do the ALS Ice Bucket Challenge... good luck
Alright now?... Yeah

title: Jamie Oliver's ALS Ice Bucket Challenge

I met Jamie once when I was working as an extra and have to say that off 
camera he is still a good lad. He is really funny and swears a lot, most 
celebrities are arse holes off camera but this guy was joking around with 
us and telling us how he got drunk one night and where he goes shopping. A 
really down to earth sort of bloke I have to say. God bless him.﻿

comments.author: Girlique

comments.text:
+NJSMKMMS I don't care really.  I have had type 1 diabetes most of my life 
and in my opinion that's the most shitty disease known to me.  I wouldn't 
wish it on my worst enemy.  I'm not really worried about anything you  have 
to say and I won't be looking up any other diseases because the one I live 
with is bad enough.
comments.author: Girlique

comments.text:
While we are on the subject of ALS and there for, diseases. Did you know 
that the Zebra (your symbol for your YT channel) is the patron animal for 
at least 2 more of the most shitty diseases known to man, that most people 
wouldn't wish on the worst troll, or enemy in the world. Some variants of 
which don't even give you the dignity of killing you relatively quickly 
like ALS does, nor are they easily diagnosed because they appear so much 
like a myriad of other diseases that are not life threatening. Look up 
Mitochondrial disease and Ehlers Danlos Syndrome if you want to know 
more.
comments.author: NJSMKMMS

comments.text: One of the best ones I've seen.﻿
comments.author: James B

comments.text:
How much water has the ALS Ice Bucket Challenge wasted? Comparatively 
speaking, very little. People use much, much more water for everyday 
activities than they do for this challenge. However, from my point of view 
it´s way better to donate without doing that "challenge", so please let´s 
do a favor to our planet and stop doing this. 
P.S: I know that this "challenge" is a kind of publicity so it would spread 
quickly and make people concious about the ALS, but please it´s already too 
much. Just donate and save water!!! :3 (soorry for my english)﻿
comments.author: Alessandra Isabel Larios Obregon

comments.text:
+KitMuzeek oh, i didn´t, but 97% of the water is part of the ocean, which 
actually is not useful for us. We need to take care of our fresh water 
(from lakes, swamps, rivers. I dont think the amount of fresh water hasn´t 
change, just look at the icecaps and glaciers, they are all melting fast 
and it goes to the ocean!
Otherwise we probably wouldn´t see many "save the water" campaigns.
